name: Opencast Software
description: Opencast is looking for a contractor in software development with expertise in Java/Scala and other languages such as Springboot, Javascript, Typescript, Kotlin, Python & C#, who has experience in a technical leadership role, deep understanding of programming paradigms, experience with agile methodology, among other skills, offering a day rate between £450-£550 for a 6-month contract, using a hybrid remote working model based in Newcastle upon Tyne.
